issue.title: [C++] Detect clcache in cmake configuration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2238](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2238). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
By default Windows builds should use clcache if installed.

comments.body:
